(:action wash_wicks
    :parameters (?w - wick)
    :precondition (and (dry ?w))
    :effect (and (wet ?w) (not (dry ?w)))
)

Note: The step "rub_with_rubber" seems redundant and irrelevant to the task of removing skid marks from the linoleum. It appears to be an error or misplaced step.
